models.name: discussion_board_guests
models.description: Guest users who have not registered or logged in. They can view public discussions and have limited functionality. This table stores basic information about unauthenticated users who may later register to become members.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address for potential registration. Nullable as guests may not provide email.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Guest's name if provided.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Guest's nickname if provided.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_members
models.description: Registered users who have logged in. Members can create discussions, comment, vote, and follow other users. This table stores authentication information and user profiles.

foreignFields.name: guest_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the guest record if this member was previously a guest. {@link discussion_board_guests.id}.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Member's email address for authentication. Must be unique.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication. Never stored in plain text.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Member's unique username. Must be unique across the system.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Member's real name if provided.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Member's display nickname.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the member account was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_moderators
models.description: Users with elevated permissions to manage content and enforce community guidelines. Moderators can delete inappropriate content, manage reports, and ban users. This table stores moderator-specific information and references the member account.

foreignFields.name: member_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the member account that has moderator privileges. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

plainFields.name: permissions
plainFields.description: JSON string representing moderator permissions and capabilities.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator privileges were granted.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator privileges were last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_discussions
models.description: Discussion threads created by users on the discussion board. Contains the main content and metadata for each discussion topic.

foreignFields.name: member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who created the discussion. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

foreignFields.name: category_id
foreignFields.description: Category this discussion belongs to. {@link discussion_board_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the discussion thread.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Main content of the discussion.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the discussion (active, pending, deleted, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the discussion was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the discussion was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: When the discussion was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: discussion_board_comments
models.description: Comments on discussion threads. Supports nested replies through parent_comment_id.

foreignFields.name: discussion_id
foreignFields.description: Discussion this comment belongs to. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who created the comment. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

foreignFields.name: parent_comment_id
foreignFields.description: Parent comment for nested replies (self-reference). {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Content of the comment.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the comment (active, pending, deleted, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: When the comment was soft deleted, if applicable.

models.name: discussion_board_votes
models.description: Votes on discussions and comments. Tracks upvotes and downvotes.

foreignFields.name: discussion_id
foreignFields.description: Discussion being voted on. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: comment_id
foreignFields.description: Comment being voted on. {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

foreignFields.name: member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who cast the vote. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

plainFields.name: vote_type
plainFields.description: Type of vote: 'upvote' or 'downvote'.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the vote was cast.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the vote was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_flags
models.description: Flags for inappropriate content on discussions and comments.

foreignFields.name: discussion_id
foreignFields.description: Discussion being flagged. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: comment_id
foreignFields.description: Comment being flagged. {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

foreignFields.name: member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who flagged the content. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Reason for flagging the content.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the flag (pending, reviewed, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When the content was flagged.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When the flag was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_categories
models.description: Categories for organizing discussions by topic. Users can categorize discussions into different topics like economics, politics, etc. This table represents the main discussion categories that help organize content.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the category (e.g., 'Economics', 'Politics', 'General').

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description of the category's purpose and scope.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_tags
models.description: Tags for categorizing and searching discussions. Users can apply multiple tags to discussions for better organization and discovery. This table represents the tag entities that can be applied to discussions.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the tag (e.g., 'Tax Policy', 'Election 2024', 'Inflation').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the tag was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the tag was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_discussion_tags
models.description: Junction table connecting discussions and tags. This table enables the many-to-many relationship between discussions and tags, allowing multiple tags to be applied to each discussion and each tag to be used on multiple discussions.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_discussion_id
foreignFields.description: The discussion this tag is applied to. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_tag_id
foreignFields.description: The tag applied to the discussion. {@link discussion_board_tags.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the tag was applied to the discussion.

models.name: discussion_board_email_notifications
models.description: Email notifications for discussion board activities. Tracks notifications sent via email for user activities like replies, mentions, and moderation alerts.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who receives the notification. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_discussion_id
foreignFields.description: Discussion related to the notification. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_comment_id
foreignFields.description: Comment related to the notification. {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Type of notification (reply, mention, moderation, etc.).

plainFields.name: email_address
plainFields.description: Email address where notification was sent.

plainFields.name: subject
plainFields.description: Email subject line.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Email body content.

plainFields.name: sent_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when notification was sent.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when notification record was created.

models.name: discussion_board_in_app_notifications
models.description: In-app notifications for discussion board activities. Tracks notifications displayed within the application for user activities like replies, mentions, and moderation alerts.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: Member who receives the notification. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_discussion_id
foreignFields.description: Discussion related to the notification. {@link discussion_board_discussions.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_comment_id
foreignFields.description: Comment related to the notification. {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Type of notification (reply, mention, moderation, etc.).

plainFields.name: message
plainFields.description: Notification message content.

plainFields.name: is_read
plainFields.description: Whether the notification has been read by the user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when notification was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when notification was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_data_protection
models.description: Stores data protection settings for users in the discussion board. Contains security-related preferences and configurations to protect user data. References {@link discussion_board_members.id} for user-specific settings.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: User who owns these data protection settings. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

plainFields.name: encrypt_communications
plainFields.description: Whether to encrypt communications with this user.

plainFields.name: data_retention_days
plainFields.description: Number of days to retain user data before deletion.

plainFields.name: share_data_with_third_parties
plainFields.description: Whether user allows data sharing with third parties.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When this data protection setting was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When this data protection setting was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_privacy_settings
models.description: Stores privacy settings for users in the discussion board. Contains user preferences for profile visibility and content sharing. References {@link discussion_board_members.id} for user-specific settings.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: User who owns these privacy settings. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

plainFields.name: profile_visible_to_public
plainFields.description: Whether user profile is visible to public.

plainFields.name: show_email_to_followers
plainFields.description: Whether to show email address to followers.

plainFields.name: allow_mentions
plainFields.description: Whether to allow mentions by other users.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When this privacy setting was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When this privacy setting was last updated.

models.name: discussion_board_rate_limits
models.description: Stores rate limiting configurations for users and guests. Contains settings to prevent abuse of the discussion board system. References {@link discussion_board_members.id} for user-specific limits and {@link discussion_board_guests.id} for guest-specific limits.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_member_id
foreignFields.description: User who this rate limit applies to. {@link discussion_board_members.id}.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_guest_id
foreignFields.description: Guest who this rate limit applies to. {@link discussion_board_guests.id}.

plainFields.name: max_posts_per_hour
plainFields.description: Maximum number of posts allowed per hour.

plainFields.name: max_comments_per_minute
plainFields.description: Maximum number of comments allowed per minute.

plainFields.name: max_votes_per_day
plainFields.description: Maximum number of votes allowed per day.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When this rate limit configuration was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When this rate limit configuration was last updated.
